name: Paul Landers
description: '''Paul Landers''' ({{IPA|de|ˈpaʊl ˈlandɐs}}; born '''Heiko Paul Hiersche''' {{IPA|de|ˈhaɪkoː ˈpaʊl ˈhiːɐ̯ʃə|}}; 9 December 1964) is a German musician, best known as the rhythm guitarist of [[Neue Deutsche Härte]] band [[Rammstein]], and [[punk rock]] bands [[Feeling B]] and [[First Arsch]]. Landers has released eight studio albums and three live albums with Rammstein.
